scripts.apk-android: rm -f android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android/app/src/main/res && rm -rf drawable-* && cd ../../../../.. && rm -f package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npx jetify && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.remove-cache: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && rm -rf /tmp/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rf /tmp/haste-map-react-native-packager-*
